text: Yulia Victorovna Nachalova (; 31 January 1981, Voronezh, Russian SFSR, USSR â€“ 16 March 2019, Moscow, Russia) was a Soviet and Russian singer, actress and television presenter. == Personal life == From 2001 to 2004 Yulia was married to Dmitry Lanskoy. Then, from 2006 to 2011, Nachalova was married to Eugeny Aldonin. Had one child with Aldonin, a daughter Vera Aldonina (b.December 1, 2006). In October 2011, she was in a relationship with Alexander Frolov. On morning of July 27, 2012, during her flight from Moscow to Los Angeles, Yulia became ill. Upon arrival in Los Angeles, Nachalova was hospitalized in critical condition. In March 2019, Nachalova was hospitalized due to a sharp rise in her blood sugar level. She died of a cerebral edema in a Moscow hospital on March 16, 2019, aged 38. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1981 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral edema Category:Russian singers Category:Russian actors Category:Voronezh Category:People from Voronezh Oblast
title: Yulia Nachalova
